content: Please feel free to ask questions about the use of our Atlassian offerings JIRA and Confluence. Remember, do not post passwords. Thanks!
there is a markdown widget that used to work and now it does not.
pasted image
for those of use who prefer to write in markdown this was a nice alternative to using the formatting tools
Hello Eric, can you provide a link to a page where this has been used previously please?
I did notice that an appended "space" after the input markdown results in what your picture displays. When I removed that space I got pasted image
Thanks but is still not working on my system. maybe is a local thing.
Ok, I think you are probably right. I would try an alternate browser and if you see a port specified after "confluence.hl7.org" in the url please remove and retry.
Hey @Lloyd McKenzie , @Brett Marquard is not able to vote. I have checked his permissions and account and all seems correct. Any ideas?
Able to vote or able to comment? Voting isn't enabled for anyone yet - still must be done by spreadsheet. However, you can comment in Jira and reference your comments in the spreadsheet.
this is for CDAMG eVote -- https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CDA/Approve+PSS+for+Dental+Implementation+Guide
Voting in Confluence itself? I have no clue. Keeping track of Jira is more than sufficient for my brain at the moment :)
haha, thanks Lloyd. @Joshua Procious any other ideas?
That was my error. Follow up in pm.

There is a known issue with Confluence edits. Edits to pages may not be available at this time. Joshua Procious is reviewing the issue. Confluence may be unavailable for brief periods while the issue is being resolved.
Confluence is back online. If you have any questions or need assistance with data during a page load missing, please let me know here or at joshua@hl7.org.

All, as our Atlassian products gain more usage (JIRA, Confluence) it becomes more important to whitelist the domain hl7.org in your email client. This is done in Outlook by adding the domain hl7.org to your Safe Senders. If possible, add lists.hl7.org in there while you are at it. :)

All mail from our Atlassian servers comes from webmaster@hl7.org if you need to indicate a specific address. This will help to keep everyone informed of important notifications from JIRA and Confluence.
Confluence is still undergoing an upgrade. Thank you for your patience. Approx time 1hour.
Thank you for your continued patience. Confluence new up time 12:00 PM EST
Confluence is back online. If you have any questions, please email joshua@hl7.org.

Scrolled through this long string and searched through all instructions for use of Jira and I can't find any instructions on how to download a final reconciliation spreadsheet once all reconciliation has been completed. Please advise - it will hold up publication of an IG from a September 2019 ballot for which nearly all reconciled items are applied.

@Floyd Eisenberg Thanks for pointing out the need for some documentation on this. It now exists :)

You can find the instructions here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HL7/Reconciliation+spreadsheets

On the plus side, they're pretty short and sweet...

Floyd Eisenberg Thanks for pointing out the need for some documentation on this. It now exists :)

You can find the instructions here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HL7/Reconciliation+spreadsheets

On the plus side, they're pretty short and sweet...

Thank you very much. It works well and it's very direct as I can do it successfully.

@Lloyd McKenzie The Reconciliation Spreadsheet instructions are clearly short and sweet. However, although they worked in February, when I click on Reconciliation Spreadsheet nothing downloads. Is there a bug or is there a new process of which I'm not aware? Thanks. Floyd
What's the ballot?
Note that nothing will download - it'll just attach...
QM IG from February 2020
https://jira.hl7.org/browse/BALDEF-1652

Lloyd - note that the spreadsheet will not download for Data Exchange for Quality Measures either: https://jira.hl7.org/browse/BALDEF-1650?jql=project%3D%22BALDEF%22%20AND%20text~%22quality%20measure%22
